title: Easy way to FIX AATROX
body:
As someone who basically only plays aatrox on all my accounts, i feel like the easiest solution to fixing him in HIS CURRENT BUILD is reduce the ammount required on his passive by 20%. AKA each ability should give 25%.

Why you ask? its the only reasonable way to make his passive proccable, but it also allows him to proc the attack speed boost more often, which would make him healthier without being overpowered what so ever

replies.body: Yes. I see many players suggesting this. I think its very reasonable. If only Riot every paid attention to us.
